commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I can't stay sad about this forever. The best thing for me to do is use the next live show to erase my last performance's failures!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! Now you're back to your usual self!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I am! Let's make this a live show I can proudly show Shioriko! I can't let myself get down over this!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And more than anything, I want to sing a song to everyone who supports me that's packed 100% full of my feelings.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So...I'm asking you once more to help me accomplish that.

commands.select_args: ||Let's give it another go. Together!|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course. If there's anything I can do to help, I'll do it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you! Please give me your most candid opinions!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I also take responsibility for not noticing the problem myself, so let's give it another go together.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Absolutely. I'll be sure to examine my own feelings closely so there's no mistakes this time!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now, that being said! I'd like to get everyone's help on coming up with a song for my next live show!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So you say, but you look like you've already got an idea of what you're gonna do.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* Ai, you're so sharp! So take this!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa! What's with the hugging? I mean thanks and all, but what's going on, Setsu?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And one for all of you! A hug here, a hug there, a hug for you and you and you!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Eek!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Whoa!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Guh!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wah!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Wh-What's gotten into you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahaha! This is a hint about Setsuna's new song.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: A hint about her new song? What does that mean?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I've gotta pour all my love into it, so I'm just reaffirming my love!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hmm? I don't really get it.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I think she means her love for all of us.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Exactly!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! But I thought Setsuna's new song would be inspired by her love for her favorite anime and stuff, like usual.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Well, I realized something important talking to Shioriko. When I looked into my heart and thought about what I really love... It wasn't my favorite characters. It was you all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Setsuna...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Shioriko, thank you so much! It was thanks to you that I realized what I needed to focus on.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And thank you for validating me. Our viewpoints may be different, but you didn't reject me. You accepted me... So I feel confident in being who I am.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And that's why at my next live show, I'm going to sing a song that's full of all my feelings of love!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Of course, thinking about what other people love is wonderful in its own right. But it's hard for me to love those things in the same way they do.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You don't love something because you decide to love it. You just realize that you already do.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So I'm not going to sing a song that tries to speak on behalf of others or do what they want of me. I'm going to sing from the heart about what I'm feeling!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Some of my fans might notice that how I feel is a bit different from how they feel as a result. But I can't help that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: A world where everyone can freely say what they love isn't one where people push what they love on others. It's one where no one denies or rejects others for what they love!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A world where no one rejects what other people love, huh? Yeah, that's exactly it. Let's get everyone to see what it is that you love, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes! This time I'll definitely set their hearts on fire!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So ladies, I want an even bigger hug-fest!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, come at me with everything you've got!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Ahahaha!
